channel.title: GrantOtter — Federal Funding Updates
channel.description: Aggregated weekly feed of grant opportunities and agency news from NIH, NSF, DOE, DARPA, NASA, and Grants.gov.

item.title: NSF launches $100M National Quantum and Nanotechnology Research Infrastructure program
item.description: The U.S. National Science Foundation is investing up to $100 million to establish a nationwide network of open-access research facilities for quantum and nanoscale technologies, innovation, and workforce training. Through the new NSF National Quantum…

item.title: Transitioning NCAR-Wyoming Supercomputing Center operations
item.description: The U.S. National Science Foundation has informed the NSF National Center for Atmospheric Research (NCAR) that management and operations of the NCAR-Wyoming Supercomputing Center are expected to transition to a third-party operator consistent with…

item.title: NSF announces first AI-ENGAGE awards to modernize global agriculture
item.description: The U.S. National Science Foundation, in coordination with partner agencies from Australia, India and Japan, today announced the first cohort of awards made under the Advancing Innovations for Empowering NextGen AGriculturE (AI-ENGAGE) initiative…
